comments.body: Out of curiosity, why did you remove the callback argument? I can imagine it could be useful at some point, but we could add it then.
Because it was used as `fallback(path)` i.e. with the `path` argument which is in the scope anyway, i.e. when you call `onChangedFile(x) { path => ... }`, that `path` will be exactly the same `x`.
